text: I like to make decisions based on data rather than intuition.
I enjoy exploring different perspectives and considering alternative viewpoints.
I find satisfaction in identifying patterns and trends in information.
I believe that practical applications are more important than theoretical ideas.
I like to hear other people’s perspectives when I’m solving a problem.
I enjoy coming up with ideas that others haven’t thought of.
I believe that a step-by-step approach is essential for solving most problems.
I think a lot about how my decisions could affect the people around me.
I find it exciting to tackle problems that don't have straightforward answers.
I enjoy distilling complex information to understand it better.
I like working in groups better when people share a common vision.
I tend to prioritize tasks based on their immediate relevance and impact.
